name: Rift Valley
description: A deep underwater canyon created by tectonic activity creates unique environments and potential access to the earth's interior. The extreme depth creates unique exploration challenges, while the geological activity can create valuable minerals or dangerous conditions.
atmosphere: Massive underwater canyon created by tectonic forces reveals the earth's geological history while deep rumbling marks ongoing activity. Exposed rock faces show valuable mineral deposits as the rift plunges toward the planet's molten core. Cold water carries ancient earth scents. Window into the planet's violent geological processes.
